Message:
Several years passed since then,
with Liberia and I
becoming dear friends.

One day, I was on my way
to meet with Liberia
like always, until...

Suddenly,
I became surrounded
by armed men from
the People of the Sand.

I-It’ll be alright...!
If I just tell them
why I’m here,
like I did with Liberia...!

But, just as I was about to
explain myself to
the spear-wielding men...

“We will kill you,
as our law wills!”

The men raised
their spears in unison.

But, just as I squeezed
my eyes shut in fear...

Liberia leapt before me
in a guarding stance.
Liberia...you came...!

“She is an outsider.
We must kill her,
as the law wills!”

As the trembling Liberia
gripped her dagger,
the men glared at her
with eyes turned cold.

Eyes filled with scorn
towards a traitor.

At this rate,
Liberia will also be...!
What can I do...?!
